name: arda-catalog-api
description: Reading/Writing operations using .NET Core and DynamoDB
author: Jackson Willer Macedo Duarte

scripts.build: dotnet restore && dotnet lambda package --configuration Release --framework net8.0 --output-package bin/Release/net8.0/deploy-package.zip
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run test && node_modules/.bin/serverless deploy --verbose
